venue.address_1: Spaulding Auditorium, Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH 03755
venue.name: Spaulding Auditorium, Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH 03755

item.description:
From the Hopkins Center website:

BARBARY COAST JAZZ ENSEMBLE AND DARTMOUTH COLLEGE GOSPEL CHOIR

Hop Ensemble
Don Glasgo director of Barbary Coast Jazz Ensemble
Walt Cunningham director of Dartmouth College Gospel Choir

SOULFUL CELEBRATION!
Inspired by the directors’ long-term friendship and collaboration, two ensembles unite to explore the connections between gospel and jazz. Featuring music from Ramsey Lewis’ award-winning gospel CD, With One Voice, the groups will perform their directors’ own arrangements of works from that collection as well as Quincy Jones’ version of Handel’s Hallelujah Chorus, and then pull out the stops on blues- and Latin-inspired favorites from the repertoires of both Gospel Choir and the Coast.

Tickets are $18 and are available online at the Hopkins Center website

https://dartix.dartmouth.edu/online/seatSelect.asp

or at the Hopkins Center box office

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group
